page.title: 07THE NEW LAINDON WEST CENTRE
page.content: {Basildon Corporation}were responsible for building the{Laindon West {Community Centre.}However the people who use the centre and the volunteers who work there feel that a new centre is needed.The old building needs lots of repairs. The walls are cracking, the toilets overflow, the floors are badly damaged. Mr. Blake, the secretary of the centre, says that the entire building needs to be pulled down.It will cost{Â£245,000}to build a new centre.The council have agreed to contribute{Â£145,000}and a brewery have given a loan of{Â£55,000. Â£50,000 is still needed and an Action Group has been set up to raise this money. One of the fund raising activities has been a sponsored press-up event. This event raised{Â£250.}The rest of the money will be needed by September.
